summary: An irresponsible journalist tries different way to interview a fiery lawyer who stood up for a social cause.
cast: Mohanlal|Manju Warrier|Innocent|Lena|Reenu Mathews|Jacob Gregory|Minon|Renji Panicker|Disney James|Babu Annur|Kochouseph Chittilappilly|Kalpana|Santhosh Keezhattoor|Pradeep Kottayam|Jayaprakash Kuloor|Dileep Munshi|Chali Pala|Dileesh Pothan|Sreeya Remesh|Kozhikkode Sarada|Baiju V.K.
title: Ennum Eppozhum
